duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the safe operation of the delivery vehicle.
Deliver pre-sold products to various locations within the Greater Boston area.
Maintain a customer service-oriented approach by treating each account with professionalism and courtesy.
Build and load products each morning, including loading empty keg returns onto the truck.
Possibility of long drives to Cape Cod and communicating possible barriers throughout the day with the supervisor.
Completing 20+ deliveries a day on Tuesday-Friday from 7:00 am to 5:00 pm.
